options: ['The library is on the first floor.', 'There are some French books in the library.', 'I like reading books very much.', 'We can borrow books from the library.']
questions: Which of the following is NOT true ?
article: There is a library in our school. It is near our classroom. It is on the first floor. Our school library is not very big, but it is very nice. There are many books in the library. Some are in Chinese, some are in English. I like reading very much. I often go there to borrow books. The _ is a woman. She is very good. We all like her very much.
